subject: Re: Reminder: Order #SSN3901, how did it go?
description_text:
Hello,

i'm still waiting for a response as there are still parts missing 
(BasePlate)

best regards
Robert Aichhorn

Am 19.12.2025 um 14:19 schrieb SIMSONN:
> Hello Robert, We would be grateful if you shared how things look and 
> feel. Your review helps us and the community that supports us, and it 
> only takes a few 
> seconds. ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌

conversations.body_text: Hi Aichhorn Robert,  The tracking numer for the base plate is JSELY0264253542YQ,   the shipping carrier is JSEXPRESS, you can track it via https://www.17track.net/en)
